column1: # The format of this document is as follows
What is your favourite thing about this job?|FIRST|I'd say helping the customers and seeing them happy
column2: Whats the most challenging drink to make?|SECOND|The special drinks tend to have like 5-6 ingrediants so there is a lot to remember
column3: What is your favourite drink here?|THIRD|The normal latte maybe?
column4: Does the company have any plans for growth in the next few years?|FOURTH|They Do! They are planning to introuduce new ranges of drinks to appeal to an older audience!
